actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health and Environment.

official_title: To amend the Public Health Service Act to provide for a national program to conduct and support activities toward the goal of significantly reducing the number of cases of overweight and obesity among individuals in the United States.
short_title: Lifelong Improvements in Food and Exercise (LIFE) Act

summary.text: Lifelong Improvements in Food and Exercise (LIFE) Act - Amends the Public Health Service Act to direct the Secretary of Health and Human Services to carry out a national program to conduct and support specified activities regarding individuals who are overweight or are obese in order to make progress toward the goal of significantly reducing the number of cases of obesity. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: Lifelong Improvements in Food and Exercise (LIFE) Act

To amend the Public Health Service Act to provide for a national program to conduct and support activities toward the goal of significantly reducing the number of cases of overweight and obesity among individuals in the United States.
